issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: *Assessment* [euca-bundle-instance|https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/3.4/index.html#image-guide/img_task_modify_existing_instance_store_image.html] doesn't work in Eucalyptus 4.0.0 against an instance store-backed HVM instance. {code} [root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca-describe-instances i-7b736c5f RESERVATION r-c4a30602 408181979667 default INSTANCE i-7b736c5f emi-f87a5005 10.104.6.231 172.18.0.175 running euca-admin 0 c1.xlarge 2014-04-16T23:34:19.788Z GiftOfGab monitoring-disabled 10.104.6.231 172.18.0.175 instance-store hvm sg-3331a047 TAG instance i-7b736c5f euca:node 10.104.1.188 [root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca-bundle-instance -b fedora20-x86_64-hvm-root -p fedora20-x86_64-root -o AKIHTMNYTRQ0MIHQAKEY -w yPRQ3we37Wsy26T7AA5fKhgyNlqnii2iRN2XjVTp i-7b736c5f euca-bundle-instance: error (InternalError): Unable to create the bucket {code} This looks to be a regression since this worked in 3.4.2. euca-bundle-instance is being executed as the cloud administrator. *Signs* * euca-bundle-instance ran with debug option: {code} [root@odc-d-31 ~]# euca-bundle-instance -b fedora20-x86_64-hvm-root -p fedora20-x86_64-root -o AKIHTMNYTRQ0MIHQAKEY -w yPRQ3we37Wsy26T7AA5fKhgyNlqnii2iRN2XjVTp i-7b736c5f --debug 2014-04-16 20:17:44,845 DEBUG BundleInstance parsed arguments: {'Storage.S3.Prefix': 'fedora20-x86_64-root', 'Storage.S3.AWSAccessKeyId': 'AKIHTMNYTRQ0MIHQAKEY', 'owner_sak': 'yPRQ3we37Wsy26T7AA5fKhgyNlqnii2iRN2XjVTp', 'security_token': None, 'InstanceId': 'i-7b736c5f', 'region': None, 'expires': 24, 'url': None, 'show_empty_fields':
